metadata.label: Transcript
metadata.value: as on deposit at South Carolina historical Society  Cataog of Albert Simons papers  Cooper-Santee project clippings 1941  Odd clippings on buildings in Charleston 1930"s and 1940s  Historic Amercian buildings Survey, 1935  Coaborator-at llarge correspondence  least Battery development Project 1933 [not done] .  American Institute of Architects Committee  Safeguarding Charleston Architecture 1930-37 and correspondence with Committee [May be eary genesis of HCF]  American Institute of Architects Committee on  Preservation of Historic buildings 1928-1933  mainly reports to eicester Hoand on what  was going on in Charleston  Historic Centers, Charleston, 1933 [not done]  Safeguarding Propaganda-A few etters in 1932  defending Charleston preservationists  Hacksonvie, Fa. City plan, 1931 [printed]  Horry Hous e, Mrs. Andreini [proposa to will  the house to the AIA 1931  Sumner Appeton letter on preservation problems  Manigaut House 1927-1937  Many problems with Standard OIL Complany and  with fund-raising.  [Materia now in South Carolina historical Society from  Albert Simons papers incudes: Hoand etters, materia  on Heyward-Washington House, writing of plantations of   Carolina ow Country, Aston Deas, John Mead Howes,  many etters to Mr. and Mrs. William Emerson who helped  Charleston Preservation work, eary Histories American  buildings Survey etters.]
